spec_data.Name: lirc-disable-kernel-rc
spec_data.Description:
Part of the LIRC package suite which handles IR remotes. See
the package lirc for more.

This package contains an udev rule which disables the kernel built-in
handling of infrared devices (i. e., rc* ones) by making lirc the only
used protocol.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 15 Aug 2017 02:51:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Disable kernel ir device handling in favor of lirc
